text: The 2017 ICC World Cricket League Asia Region Division One was an international cricket tournament that took place in Chiang Mai, Thailand.The teams competing in the tournament were hosts Thailand, Bhutan, Bahrain, China, Kuwait, Qatar and Saudi Arabia. The winner of the qualifier progressed to ICC WCL Division 5 which was staged in September 2017. == Teams == Seven teams invited by ICC for the tournament: * * * * * * * == Points table == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=200 |Team !width=30 abbr="Played" |P !width=30 abbr="Won" |W !width=30 abbr="Lost" |L !width=30 abbr="Tied" |T !width=30 abbr="No result" |NR !width=60 |Points !width=60 abbr="Net run rate" |NRR !width=417 |Status |-style="background: #D0F0C0;" | align="left" | || 6 || 5 || 1 || 0 || 0 || 10 || +2.665 || rowspan=1| Qualify for 2017 ICC World Cricket League Division Five |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 6 || 5 || 1 || 0 || 0 || 10 || +2.472|| rowspan=6| Did not Qualify for 2017 ICC World Cricket League Division Five |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 6 || 4 || 2 || 0 || 0 || 8 || +0.652 |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 6 || 3 || 3 || 0 || 0 || 6 || +0.676 |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 6 || 3 || 3 || 0 || 0 || 6 || +0.496 |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 6 || 1 || 5 || 0 || 0 || 2 || -1.943 |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 6 || 0 || 6 || 0 || 0 || 0 || –6.801 |} Source: Cricinfo == References == Category:2017–19 ICC World Cricket League Category:2017 in cricket
